actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 20 (4d6+6) bludgeoning damage and target: DC 16 Str save or pushed up to 10 ft. away from it and knocked prone.

actions.name: Shatterstone (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Hurls enchanted rock at point it can see within 60' of it. Rock shatters on impact and each creature within 10 ft. of that point: 44 (8d10) slashing damage (DC 16 Dex half).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 14) no material components: At will: entangle speak with plants stone shape2/day: plant growth

special_abilities.name: Healing Lotuscraft
special_abilities.desc: (1/Day). Can spend 1 min crafting poultice that lasts 24 hrs. When a creature takes an action to apply poultice to a wound or skin of a creature target regains 18 (4d8) hp and is cured of any diseases or conditions affecting it.
